title: Sarah Marshall • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #209
itunes:title: Sarah Marshall • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #209
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with writer, journalist and podcaster SARAH MARSHALL!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with writer, journalist and podcaster SARAH MARSHALL!


Okay just to get it out the way, yes there's a shared name with a comedy film that you may be familiar with, but all any similarity to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events, is purely coincidental (or something along those lines). Long openers aside, this is a fantastic episode with Brett and Sarah checking in on all kind of awesome trivia, facts, rumours and allegations from all over the place! It's a really fun one, and if you know Sarah from her wonderful podcast you'll have an idea of where her head is at - and for that reason, this episode never drops below fascinating. Fun and refreshing, like - oh I don't know - rainfall after a particularly hot Summer (not to get too topical or anything). Enjoy, and you shall!


TWITTER

ONLINE

YOU'RE WRONG ABOUT

YOU ARE GOOD POD


﻿BRETT GOLDSTEIN on TWITTER

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on INSTAGRAM

BRETT GOLDSTEIN on PATREON

TED LASSO

SOULMATES

SUPERBOB (Brett's 2015 feature film)

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP


DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on FACEBOOK

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM
